Constructor Detail

Configuration

public Configuration()
Method Detail

findNumberedProperties

public static java.lang.String[] findNumberedProperties(java.lang.String prefix)
Returns all configuration properties with a certain name prefix. This method is useful to collect a list of a set of properties grouped by numbering, for examle: 
   overview.file.1=...
   overview.file.2=...

Parameters:
prefix - The property name prefix.
Returns:
A Properties object with all properties found, or null, if none were found.

getGroups

public static java.util.Properties getGroups()
Returns a Properties object with all groups defined by the -group parameter.

If no groups have been defined, the properties object is empty.

Returns:
A Properties object where each key is a group name (aka bookmark label) and the value a list of colon-separated package names (see the documentation of javadoc's -group parameter for details).

isLinksCreationActive

public static boolean isLinksCreationActive()
Determines if links should be created.

Returns:
True if links should be created.

isCreateFrameActive

public static boolean isCreateFrameActive()
Determines if a bookmark frame should be created.

Returns:
True if the bookmark frame should be created.

isShowSummaryActive

public static boolean isShowSummaryActive()
Determines if summary tables should be printed.

Returns:
True if method/field summary tables should be printed.

isShowInheritedSummaryActive

public static boolean isShowInheritedSummaryActive()
Determines if inherited summary tables should be printed.

Returns:
True if summaries of inherited methods/fields should be printed.

isShowExternalInheritedSummaryActive

public static boolean isShowExternalInheritedSummaryActive()
Determines if inherited summary tables should be printed for external classes.

Returns:
True if summaries of inherited external methods/fields should be printed.

isShowVersionActive

public static boolean isShowVersionActive()
Determines if version should be printed.

Returns:
True if version should be printed.

isShowSinceActive

public static boolean isShowSinceActive()
Determines if since should be printed.

Returns:
True if since should be printed.

isShowAuthorActive

public static boolean isShowAuthorActive()
Determines if summaries should be printed.

Returns:
True if summaries should be printed.

isFilterActive

public static boolean isFilterActive()
Determines if filtering (based on tags, usually custom tags) is active.

Returns:
True if filtering is active.

getPackageOrder

public static java.lang.String getPackageOrder()
Returns the String with the comma-separated list of packages which defines the order of those packages in the bookmarks frame.

Returns:
The String with the comma-separated package list.

getWorkDir

public static java.lang.String getWorkDir()
Method getWorkDir returns the current working directory used to resolve relative paths while looking for files, like target document filename, config file, title file name.

Returns:
String The working directory, WITHOUT a directory separating character at the end

getSourcePath

public static sun.tools.java.ClassPath getSourcePath()
Method getSourcePath returns the classpath for the source path.

Returns:
ClassPath

getConfiguration

public static java.util.Properties getConfiguration()
Returns the configuration properties of the PDF doclet.

Returns:
The Properties object with all configuration values.

getProperty

public static java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String name)
Returns the value of a certain configuration property.

Parameters:
name - The name of the property.
Returns:
The value of the property (may be null).

getProperty

public static java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String name,
                                           java.lang.String defaultValue)
Returns the value of a certain configuration property.

Parameters:
name - The name of the property.
defaultValue - The default value.
Returns:
The value of the property (or the default value).

start

public static void start(com.sun.javadoc.RootDoc root)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Initializes the configuration by processing the input (commandline) options and then optionally reading configuration values from a file.

Parameters:
root - The javadoc root object.
Returns:
The name of the output file
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

hasProperty

public static boolean hasProperty(java.lang.String property)
Checks if the given property exists in the configuration.

Parameters:
property - The name of the property.
Returns:
True if such a property is available in the configuration, false if not.

getBooleanConfigValue

public static boolean getBooleanConfigValue(java.lang.String property,
                                            boolean defaultValue)
Returns the boolean value of a configuration property. If the property has a value of either "false" or "no", the method returns false. Otherwise it returns true if the property exists, but has no value. If the property does not exist at all, it returns the given default value.

Parameters:
property - The name of the configuration property.
defaultValue - The default value for the property if it's not set.
Returns:
The property's value.
